sentence: The  temporary  cease-fire  comes  after  Hamas-led  militants  killed  roughly  1,200  people  in  the  Oct.  7  attacks  and  seized  about  240  hostages,  according  to  Israeli  officials.
Since  then,  Israel's  air  and  ground  assaults  in  Gaza  have  killed  at  least  12,700  Palestinians,  according  the  Palestinian  health  ministry.
